1.name: Nosferatu
1.description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

2.name: Häxan
2.description: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in modern Europe.

3.name: Dr. Mabuse, der Spieler
3.description: Arch-criminal Dr. Mabuse sets out to make a fortune and run Berlin. Detective Wenk sets out to stop him.

4.name: Robin Hood
4.description: A nobleman becomes the vigilante Robin Hood who protects the oppressed English people from the tyrannical Prince John.

5.name: Salomé
5.description: Salome, the daughter of Herodias, seduces her step-father/uncle Herod, governor of Judea, with a salacious dance. In return, he promises her the head of the prophet John the Baptist.

6.name: Blood and Sand
6.description: A toreador's familial and social life is threatened when he has an affair.

7.name: Foolish Wives
7.description: A con artist masquerades a Russian nobility and attempts to seduce the wife of an American diplomat.

8.name: The Toll of the Sea
8.description: While visiting China, an American man falls in love with a young Chinese woman, but he then has second thoughts about the relationship.

9.name: Number 13
9.description: The story was about low-income residents of a building, financed by The Peabody Trust, founded by American banker-philanthropist George Foster Peabody, to offer affordable housing to needy Londoners.

10.name: Grandma's Boy
10.description: A meek young man must find the courage within when a rogue tramp menaces his home town.

11.name: Oliver Twist
11.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

12.name: Phantom
12.description: A shiftless young man becomes obsessed with a mysterious woman and yearns to find her again.

13.name: Sherlock Holmes
13.description: A young Sherlock Holmes seeks to bring down the criminal mastermind Moriarty as he solves a crime involving a blackmailed prince.

14.name: Luffar-Petter
14.description: Peter joins the army after fleeing from the repercussions of a love affair. Greta is one of the daughters of a mayor from the army. Her father is the major, at whose town Peter's army ...                See full summary »

15.name: When Knighthood Was in Flower
15.description: Mary Tudor, sister of England's Henry VIII, causes a stir by falling in love with a guardsman below her class.

16.name: Das Weib des Pharao
16.description: The Ethiopian King offers his daughter to a powerful Pharaoh to secure peace between the two countries.

17.name: The Young Rajah
17.description: A young man raised in the American South discovers he is an Indian prince whose throne was taken by usurpers.

18.name: Beauty's Worth
18.description: Prudence Cole is an unsophisticated Quaker girl being raised by her two aunts. Prudence is flirted with by snobbish Henry Garrison, who actually disdains the girl for her lack of ...                See full summary »

19.name: The Prisoner of Zenda
19.description: When the king is drugged and abducted by his ambitious brother, a lookalike relative must take his place to keep the evil sibling off the throne.

20.name: Lucrezia Borgia
20.description: Rodrigo Borgia, Pope Alexander VI, has three adult children: Juan, who is virtuous and has a sweetheart who is a woman of the people, Lucrezia, who is virtuous and wants to marry Alfonso, ...                See full summary »

21.name: Der brennende Acker
21.description: When farmer Rog dies, his son Peter stays, but Johannes can not be satisfied with such a condition (and servant Maria's love) and finds a job as old Count Rudenberg's secretary. His ...                See full summary »

22.name: Monte Cristo
22.description: A film adaptation of the classic Alexandre Dumas novel. Edmond Dantes is falsely accused by those jealous of his good fortune, and is sentenced to spend the rest of his life in the ...                See full summary »

23.name: The Trap
23.description: A miner's happiness is destroyed when a rival steals his mine. He becomes obsessed with revenge, and plans a trap for the man who took his mine.

24.name: Manslaughter
24.description: Society-girl thrill seeker Lydia causes the death of motorcycle policeman and is prosecuted by her fiancé Daniel who describes in lurid detail the downfall of Rome. While she's in prison she reforms and Daniel becomes a wasted alcoholic.

25.name: The Headless Horseman
25.description: The village of Sleepy Hollow is getting ready to greet the new schoolteacher, Ichabod Crane, who is coming from New York. Crane has already heard of the village's legendary ghost, a ...                See full summary »

27.name: Shadows
27.description: A dying Chinese man converts to Christianity in order to stop a friend from being blackmailed.

29.name: The Beautiful and Damned
29.description: Gloria, the daughter in a wealthy family, has finally spent most of her father's money. She marries Tony, whose as much of a reckless spendthrift as she is, and they continue indulging ...                See full summary »

30.name: Beyond the Rocks
30.description: A young woman marries an older millionaire and then falls in love with a handsome nobleman on her honeymoon.

31.name: Tess of the Storm Country
31.description: Wealthy Elias Graves builds his home on the top of a hill, where a group of squatters have taken up residence at the bottom. Many of the men in the squatters' village have their eyes on ...                See full summary »

32.name: Die Gezeichneten
32.description: Based on the 1918 novel 'Elsker hverandre' by Aage Madelung, the film follows various lives, one of which is Jewish girl Hanne Liebe, as she grows up, and experiences the pains of living as a Jew in Russia, leading to a revolution.

33.name: Moran of the Lady Letty
33.description: A milquetoast young man of society toughens up once he's shanghaied and falls for the captain's tomboy daughter.

34.name: One Exciting Night
34.description: A young orphan girl, courted by an unpleasant older wealthy man who has a hold over her adoptive mother, falls in love with a young stranger at a party. Odd noises begin to be heard as a ...                See full summary »

35.name: Dr. Jack
35.description: Country Doctor, Jack Jackson is called in to treat the Sick-Little-Well-Girl, who has been making Dr. Saulsbourg and is sanitarium very rich, after years of unsuccessful treatment. His ...                See full summary »

36.name: Flesh and Blood
36.description: A convict hiding in Chinatown assumes the identity of a cripple to track down a businessman who framed him 15 years previously. He discovers that his daughter has fallen in love with the businessman's son.

37.name: Der var engang
37.description: A beautiful but imperious princess refuses all offers of marriage, often condemning her suitors to death. The prince of Denmark comes seeking her hand and, aided by magic objects given to him by a mysterious spirit, seeks to win her love.

38.name: A Doll's House
38.description: Nora Helmer has years earlier committed a forgery in order to save the life of her authoritarian husband Torvald. Now she is being blackmailed lives in fear of her husband's finding out and...                See full summary »

40.name: The Power of Love
40.description: Because of his financial trouble, Don Almeda (Noah Beery) promises his daughter, Maria (Barbara Bedford), to Don Alvarez (Albert Prisco). But Maria does not love Don Alvarez, and, in fact, ...                See full summary »

41.name: Down to the Sea in Ships
41.description: Story of the lives of the people in a small Quaker community and the adventures of a whaling ship.

42.name: The Man from Beyond
42.description: A man who has been frozen in the Arctic ice for 100 years returns to civilization to find his lost love.

43.name: The Three Must-Get-Theres
43.description: This delightful burlesque of Alexandre Dumas' famous adventure narrative (and then-leading screen swashbuckler Douglas Fairbanks' hit films) represented one of writer/director/star Max ...                See full summary »

45.name: Saturday Night
45.description: Though betrothed to fellow socialite Richard, Iris weds her chauffeur Tom leaving Richard to marry the family laundress' daughter Shamrock. Class differences lead to divorces and remarriages.

46.name: The Crimson Skull
46.description: To rid the range of a gang of outlaws that are rustling cattle and robbing the banks and stagecoaches, cowhand Bob Calem, working on the gang-leader's superstitions, dons a skeleton-costume...                See full summary »

47.name: A Blind Bargain
47.description: Lon Chaney performs two roles: Doctor Lamb, a mad surgeon who's doing experiments on human bodies, and his crippled and apish assistant, the result of his first experiment.

48.name: Othello
48.description: Based on Shakespeare's play: The treacherous Iago plans to ruin the life of Othello by provoking him to jealousy.

49.name: Sodom und Gomorrha
49.description: When the old multimillionaire Jackson Harber wants to marry the young model Mary, she hesitates, but her mother convinces her that this is her chance to lead a life in luxury and leisure. ...                See full summary »

50.name: Marizza, genannt die Schmuggler-Madonna
50.description: All men are under lovely Maritza's spell.Tired of working for the old woman Yelina, who forces her to cajole customs officials to help the smugglers, she flees and finds work at Mrs. Avricolos' farm.
